AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Project Reporting
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Project Reporting Cycles
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Project Cycle Window defines the steps associated with a specific Project.You may want to define several Project cycles to differentiate the different types of projects. Project cycles may use all or a subset of the used Project Status (e.g. Your opportunity project cycle may include the steps from prospect to contract - the service cycle may include steps from installation to customer acceptance.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Language
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define multiple languages to be used in the application.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define multiple languages to be used in the application.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Project Type
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define projects types with typical phases and tasks to be used in projects.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define projects types with typical phases and tasks to be used in projects.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Client
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define client characteristics, additional information, and defaults.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define client characteristics, additional information, and defaults.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Role
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create roles with assigned users, and edit roles access to organizations, windows, processes, etc.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create roles with assigned users, and edit roles access to organizations, windows, processes, etc.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: User
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create users and manage user roles to give access permissions.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create users and manage user roles to give access permissions.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Organization
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create organizations and manage the organizational structure according to your business necessities.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create organizations and manage the organizational structure according to your business necessities.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Multiphase Project
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit projects and tasks potentially requiring sales invoicing.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and edit projects and tasks potentially requiring sales invoicing.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Project Status Report
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Summary and detail Project Status
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: To report on your projects, select the project cycle and restricting parameters. If you miss certain projects check their status and if the project status is included in your Project cycle.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Accounting Schema
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Project as Account Segment
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: To enable accounting reporting of projects, create and enable a project segment in the account elements.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: System Elements
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Translate System Elements
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: System Elements are used to centrally define field labels, description and help. When translating an Element, the appropriate information of Fields in Windows, Parameters and Reports are translated (overwritten)

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Messages
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Translate Messages
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Translate the messages used in Windows, Forms and Processes

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Reference
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Translate References
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: References are used as prefedined selection lists. You only need to translate the List Elements !!

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Window & Tab
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Translate Windows and Tabs
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Translate the Name, Description and Help for Windows and Tabs. Most of the Fields are already translated, if they are centrally maintained.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Form
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Translate Forms
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Forms are special Windows and you need to translate its name, description and Help.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Report & Process
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Translate Reports and Processes.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Translate the Name, Description and Help for Processes and Reports. You don't need to translate the Parameters, if they are centrally maintained.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Fiscal Calendar
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create multiple fiscal calendars and periods for accounting purposes.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create multiple fiscal calendars and periods for accounting purposes.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Account Tree
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit account elements and add them to your defined chart of accounts or account trees.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and edit account elements and add them to your defined chart of accounts or account trees.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Accounting Schema
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit multiple accounting schemas and assign them account elements; define DB tables to be included in the accounting processes, and define the GL accounts to be used by default.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and edit multiple accounting schemas and assign them account elements; define DB tables to be included in the accounting processes, and define the GL accounts to be used by default.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: G/L Category
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define G/L Categories to be used in the General Ledger.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define G/L Categories to be used in the General Ledger.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Document Type
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and manage document types to be used for all application transactions.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and manage document types to be used for all application transactions.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Document Sequence
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define an auto numbering system to uniquely identify document types.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define an auto numbering system to uniquely identify document types.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Business Partner Category
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit information related to similar business partners at one time by grouping them.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and edit information related to similar business partners at one time by grouping them.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Title
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define titles to be used to address a business partner.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define titles to be used to address a business partner.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Payment Term
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define payment terms to be used for business partners taking part in transactions.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define payment terms to be used for business partners taking part in transactions.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Invoice Schedule
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define invoice schedules to be used for business partners.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define invoice schedules to be used for business partners.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Revenue Recognition
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Revenue Recognition Rules
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Revenue Recognition Window defines the intervals at which revenue will be recognized. Alternatively, the revenue recognition may be linked to service levels provided.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Import Business Partner
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Import business partners in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Import business partners in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Business Partner
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit business partner information, templates, and bank accounts.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and edit business partner information, templates, and bank accounts.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: User
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define Sales Representative as User
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Users can log into the system and have access to functionality via one or more roles. Select the Business Partner you just set up. This enables the user to be treated as sales rep in the system.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Business Partner
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set up Sales Representative as Business Partner
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Set up the sales representative as Employee and Sales Representative in the Employee tab. Also set up the Vendor part, if you want to create payments.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Sales Region
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create sales regions to be used in sales operations.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create sales regions to be used in sales operations.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Commission
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define how and when you want commissions to be calculated and to whom they are to be paid.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define how and when you want commissions to be calculated and to whom they are to be paid.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Sales Channel
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create specific sales channels to be used in sales operations.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create specific sales channels to be used in sales operations.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Sales Campaign
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create specific sales campaigns to be used in sales operations.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create specific sales campaigns to be used in sales operations.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Workflow
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Translate Workflows
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Translate Name, Description and Help of Workflows and their Nodes. You only need to translate the List Elements !!

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Performance Color
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Color used for Performance Analysis
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Performance Color Window allows you to define the color schema to be used to indicate current performance. The system has predefined Red (below 50%), Yellow (below 100%) and green above 100. If you want to define your own color schema, do it here.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Performance Measure Calculation
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define how you calculate your performance measures
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Please test the statement in SQL*Plus first.The select statement needs to return a single value!Any restrictions for Date range, Organizations, Business Partners, Products should be done via the "Performance Measure" window. This is the generic calculation.As this tends to be somewhat technical, the system has a few examples predefined.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Performance Measure
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define your Performance Measures
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Performance Measure Window allows you to define the rules and restrictions for performance measurement. You can, for example, restrict performance measurement to sales for a certain product category for a defined time frame.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Performance Achievement
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define Performance Achievements
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Performance Achievement Window allows you to define Tasks to be achieved. The performance is measured by the percentage of reached achievements.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Performance Color
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Color used for Performance Analysis
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Performance Color Window allows you to define the color schema to be used to indicate current performance. The system has predefined Red (below 50%), Yellow (below 100%) and green above 100. If you want to define your own color schema, do it here.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Check Client Setup
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Check Client setup for Requests
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: You need to have a mail server and an email address from which the requets an notifications are sent. Optionally, if you define a mail user and password, requests are read from the mail users's folder and imported into the system.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Check Users
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Check users for Request processing
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Please ensure that users have a email address and supervisor assigned.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Check Business Partners
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Check Business Partners for Request processing
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: You can send EMails to businbess partners. Make sure, that the business partners and/or the Contacts have email addresses.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Request Processor
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define Request Processors
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Request Processor Window allows you to define different processes that you want to occur and the frequency and timing of these processes

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Request
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Work on your requests
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Request Window is used to define and track any request assigned to you.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Warehouse and Storage Bins
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create warehouses and organize them using storage bins.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create warehouses and organize them using storage bins.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Unit of Measure
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create units of measure and conversions rates to be applied to products.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create units of measure and conversions rates to be applied to products.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Product Category
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create product categories to better organize your products and create more powerful reports.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create product categories to better organize your products and create more powerful reports.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Product
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create products and manage the related costing, purchasing, and pricing setup.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create products and manage the related costing, purchasing, and pricing setup.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Price List Schema
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define a Price List Schema to be assigned to business partners.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define a Price List Schema to be assigned to business partners.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Price List
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit price lists and versions to optionally apply specified product prices to individual business partners.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and edit price lists and versions to optionally apply specified product prices to individual business partners.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Business Partner
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit business partner information, templates, and bank accounts.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and edit business partner information, templates, and bank accounts.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Tax Category
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create tax categories to manage tax rates with similar characteristics or attributes.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create tax categories to manage tax rates with similar characteristics or attributes.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Product
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create products and manage the related costing, purchasing, and pricing setup.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create products and manage the related costing, purchasing, and pricing setup.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Charge
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Charges
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Charges Window defines the different charges that may be incurred. These can include Bank Charges, Vendor Charges and Handling Charges.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Tax Rate
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create tax rates to be used in application transactions.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create tax rates to be used in application transactions.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Accounting Schema
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit multiple accounting schemas and assign them account elements; define DB tables to be included in the accounting processes, and define the GL accounts to be used by default.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and edit multiple accounting schemas and assign them account elements; define DB tables to be included in the accounting processes, and define the GL accounts to be used by default.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Tax Category
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create tax categories to manage tax rates with similar characteristics or attributes.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create tax categories to manage tax rates with similar characteristics or attributes.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Import File Loader
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Import .csv data files into temporary tables according to the parameters and selected format.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Import File Loader parses the content of a flat file and loads it into import tables. Comments start with a '[' and end with a ']' and are ignored; example: [Some Heading].

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Import Account
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Import accounts in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Import accounts in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Replication Strategy
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Data Replication Strategy
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: The Data Replication Strategy determines which tables and how they are replicated. Note that the migration does not syncronize Application Dictionary items.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Replication
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Data Replication Targets
AD_WF_NODE.HELP:
Data Replication Target Details. Set up your system completely on the central system, before setting up the replication. Define the Replication target here and export the database and import it on the remote system.

Before(!) entering transactions, Start the Replication Run to set up the remote system.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Activity
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Define activities (processes) to be performed as part of a process plan and their characteristics .
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Define activities (processes) to be performed as part of a process plan and their characteristics .

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Cost Center
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit cost centers related to production to sum up charges associated with a specific transaction.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create and edit cost centers related to production to sum up charges associated with a specific transaction.

AD_WF_NODE.NAME: Product
AD_WF_NODE.DESCRIPTION: Create products and manage the related costing, purchasing, and pricing setup.
AD_WF_NODE.HELP: Create products and manage the related costing, purchasing, and pricing setup.
